descriptions:
Experience ultimate comfort and style with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. Made with premium soft PU leather and hand-sewing diamond cross stitching, this chair is both comfortable and durable. The chair features a USB powered lumbar pillow with a massage function, perfect for reducing fatigue during long gaming sessions. With a chair back that reclines from 90° to 155° and a retractable footrest, you can relax like you're sleeping in bed. The chair also includes a detachable and adjustable headrest pillow and lumbar support pillow for optimal comfort and posture. 

Not only is this chair comfortable, but it also offers a range of adjustable features. The chair has a smooth 360° swivel, adjustable height, and rocking function for added versatility. The 2D armrests can be adjusted up and down and right and left, and are coated in soft PU leather for added comfort. The chair is built with a strong integrated metal frame and a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase, ensuring stability and safety. The PU casters have undergone 2000 miles rolling tests, rolling smoothly and noiselessly while protecting your floor. The chair also features a thickened explosion-proof chassis and a tilt mechanism control to adjust the chair angle and prevent overturning. 

With easy assembly instructions included, you can quickly set up your new chair. We also provide excellent customer service, with a 24/7 customer services team ready to assist you. We offer a one-month free return policy and a 5-year chair parts free replacement warranty, ensuring your satisfaction. Whether you're a gamer or an office worker, the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair is the perfect gift for yourself or a loved one. Get yours today and experience the ultimate in comfort and support.

Experience ultimate comfort and style with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair. Made with premium soft PU leather and featuring hand-sewing diamond cross stitching, this chair offers a luxurious and durable seating experience. The chair comes with a USB powered lumbar pillow that has a massage function to reduce fatigue during long gaming or working sessions. 

The chair is designed for ergonomic comfort, with a 90° to 155° reclining backrest and a retractable footrest that allows you to relax and unwind like you're sleeping in bed. The detachable and adjustable headrest and lumbar support pillows provide multi-point support, ensuring a comfortable and ideal posture. 

Not only is this chair perfect for gaming, but it is also suitable for office use. It features a smooth 360° swivel, adjustable chair height, and rocking function for added flexibility. The 2D armrests are adjustable in both height and direction, and the armrest pad is coated in soft PU leather for extra comfort. 

The chair's sturdy structure includes an integrated metal frame and a 5-point heavy-duty anti-rollover wheelbase for stability. The upgraded PU casters have undergone 2000 miles rolling tests, ensuring smooth and noiseless movement while protecting your floor. The thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control allow you to adjust the chair angle from 90° to 155°, and a safety lock prevents overturning. The chair is certified by SGS and BIFMA and has a maximum weight capacity of 330lb.

Assembly is a breeze with detailed instructions included in the package. To provide excellent service, we have pre-assembled screws to avoid any assembly trouble. Your satisfaction is our top priority, and we offer a one-month free return and a 5-year chair parts free replacement warranty. Purchase with confidence knowing that our 24/7 customer services team is ready to assist you. This chair also makes a perfect gift for birthdays, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving, or Christmas. Upgrade your gaming or office setup with the Darkecho Gaming Office Chair today.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

rocking 15°; Armrests are adjustable up and down & right and left; armrest coated in soft PU leather; integrated metal frame and 5-point heavy duty anti-rollover wheelbase; 2000 miles rolling tests;
thickened explosion-proof chassis and tilt mechanism control; adjust the chair angle by 90° To 155°; safety lock to prevent overturning; Durable SGS and BIFMA certificated gas cylinder. Maximum weight capacity: 330lb; One-month free return; 5 years chair parts free replacement warrant
